backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user profiles, books, carts, orders, KYC structures, support messages, and an exportCatalog admin function with storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that preserves nextMessageId for backward compatibility.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short human-written summaries for various frontend components and pages.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment variables setting Live environment and version 29.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Preflight deployment checklist detailing version enforcement and validation steps for Live and rollback workflows.
frontend/docs/draft-rebuild-v29.md: Instructions for rebuilding Draft Version 29 safely without deploying to Live.
frontend/docs/draft-regression-checks.md: Manual regression checklist for verifying catalog visibility and core frontend behavior before Live promotion.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v22.md: Smoke test procedure for validating Live deployment of Draft Version 22 including environment badge, catalog, media, and purchase flow checks.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29-report: Template for operators to fill out results of the Version 29 Live smoke test, including environment checks, catalog validation, and purchase flow steps.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29.md: Detailed checklist describing how to manually verify all core frontend features after deploying Version 29 to Live.
frontend/docs/publish-live.md: Instructions and safety rules for publishing Version 29 to the Live environment, enforcing version locks and frontend-only deployment.
frontend/docs/releases/v29-live-publish-: Execution log documenting the Live deployment of Version 29, including validation, build steps, and confirmation that only the frontend was deployed.
frontend/docs/releases/v29-live-smoke-te: Completed Version 29 Live smoke test report template for operators to record test results and observations.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v35.md: Procedure for rolling back the frontend to Version 35 in Draft mode without modifying backend state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the root element and main TypeScript application.
frontend/scripts/check-displayed-version: Scans frontend source files for hardcoded version labels and fails if any displayed version is not 29.
Validates rollback readiness for Version 35 by checking VERSION=35, scanning for non‑35 labels, and ensuring Footer uses VITE_APP_VERSION.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Runs pre-deployment checks for Version 29, enforcing version lock, scanning for version labels, and validating environment config.
frontend/scripts/enforce-version-29.sh: Blocks deployment unless VERSION file exists and is exactly 29, acting as a guardrail for Live publishes.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v22-hel: Prints manual smoke‑test checklist and key URLs for verifying Version 22 Live deployment.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v29-hel: Outputs manual smoke‑test steps and key URLs for validating Live deployment of Version 29.
frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh: Publishes Version 29 frontend to Live, enforcing version checks and running preflight and displayed‑version validations before deployment.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-draft-v29.sh: Rebuilds the frontend in Draft mode strictly for Version 29, enforcing version checks, regenerating bindings, cleaning artifacts, and running a Draft-configured build without touching the backend.
frontend/scripts/rollback-frontend-v35.s: Performs a frontend-only rollback to Version 35 in Draft mode by updating the VERSION file, rebuilding, running preflight checks, and deploying only the frontend canister.
frontend/scripts/rollback-preflight.sh: Runs safety and validation checks for the Version 35 rollback, verifying files, dependencies, version correctness, and dfx availability.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app’s router structure and routes for all major pages, wrapping the interface with theme support and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Admin component for uploading and removing book media (PDF, images, audio, video) with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReEnableBo: Admin tool allowing re-enabling of books by text identifier, showing detailed success or warning results after mutation.
Guards admin-only routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and status display.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book preview card with cover, metadata, availability badges, price, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a book cover using uploaded image or fallback placeholders, with error recovery.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Collects and validates KYC document info, submits verification, and displays success or error states.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: A reusable empty‑state component displaying an optional icon, title, description, and action button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with contact links, attribution, version display, and chat dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays top navigation with logo, links, login, environment badge, balance, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Defines overall page structure including header, footer, content outlet, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Generic page wrapper providing configurable max-width and spacing for page content.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Displays purchased book content and media, handling loading, errors, downloads, and expandable images.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Provides a button to download a purchased book's PDF with error handling and filename formatting.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Implements a dialog for submitting support messages and viewing threaded responses with authentication-aware behavior.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Determines the app's environment (Draft or Live) based on Vite variables and exports the resolved value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Provides a mutation for admin access recovery with user-friendly error mapping and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and checking admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Includes hooks to fetch token balance and mint new tokens, updating cached balance on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Offers queries and mutations for managing books, including listing, fetching, adding, updating, and uploading content.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: React-query hooks for fetching, modifying, and checking out the shopping cart, including enriched cart data with book details.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Provides export and import mutations for the catalog and invalidates related caches after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling login, identity persistence, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Mutation hook submitting document-based KYC proofs and updating cart-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds a user library from delivered orders and provides hooks to fetch purchased book content and media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: React-query hooks for fetching individual orders, user orders, and all orders based on actor and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for organizational purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Admin-only store reset mutation that clears multiple caches and handles permission-related errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Hooks for sending support messages, fetching user/admin message threads, and replying to messages with polling.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, react-query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, adding, editing, and managing catalog books and their media/content. Fetches all books and provides multiple management dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabs for catalog, orders, token minting, support inbox, and settings. Wraps all admin pages with admin access control.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Admin form for minting GLDT tokens to a specified principal. Validates input and triggers the mint mutation with success or error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays a table of all orders with customer, items, totals, and dates, fetching each book title for ordered items. Handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Provides admin access recovery flow requiring Internet Identity sign-in, with success state and navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings UI for resetting, exporting, and importing the catalog with file parsing and merge/overwrite options.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Admin inbox for viewing grouped customer support messages and sending responses.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single book, handles add‑to‑cart logic, identity checks, and sold‑out conditions.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items with book details, validates single‑copy constraints, and manages item removal and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Lists all available books with search filtering and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Processes checkout with balance checks, KYC flow, single‑copy validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage hero section and shows featured books from the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's purchased books and supports reading or downloading book content.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, including purchased items, total amount, and navigation options. Fetches order and book data and handles loading or missing orders.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows a purchase completion message with actions to view the order, go to the library, or continue shopping.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Utilities for validating, parsing, and merging catalog JSON data for import/export operations.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Helper functions to download files or JSON content via browser-generated links.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for token amounts, principals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Utilities for deriving KYC identifiers and validating document numbers.
Maps backend KYC restriction errors to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates unique order IDs using timestamps and randomness.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses a principal string into a Principal object with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session‑persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, issues, and feature requests related to public catalog visibility and book availability management.
